metadata.titleEn: HiWATER: 1km/5day compositing Leaf Area Index (LAI) product of Heihe River Basin, 2015
metadata.titleCn: 黑河生态水文遥感试验：黑河流域1km/5天合成叶面积指数（LAI）数据集-2015
metadata.description: The 5-day Lai synthesis results in 2015 are provided by the 1 km / 5-day Lai data set of Heihe River Basin. The data set is constructed by using the data of Terra / MODIS, Aqua / MODIS, as well as the domestic satellites fy3a / MERSI and fy3b / MERSI to construct the multi-source remote sensing data set with a spatial resolution of 1 km and a time resolution of 5 days. Multi-source remote sensing data sets can provide more angles and more observations than a single sensor in a limited time. However, due to the difference of on orbit running time and performance of sensors, the observation quality of multi-source data sets is uneven. Therefore, in order to make more effective use of multi-source data sets, the algorithm first classifies the quality of multi-source data sets, which can be divided into first level data, second level data and third level data according to the observation rationality. The third level data are observations polluted by thin clouds and are not used for calculation. The purpose of quality evaluation and classification is to provide the basis for the selection of the optimal data set and the design of inversion algorithm flow. Leaf area index product inversion algorithm is designed to distinguish mountain land and vegetation type, using different neural network inversion model. Based on global DEM map and surface classification map, PROSAIL model is used for continuous vegetation such as grassland and crops, and gost model is used for forest and mountain vegetation. Using the reference map generated by the measured ground data of the forests in the upper reaches of Heihe River and the oasis in the middle reaches, and scaling up the corresponding high-resolution reference map to 1km resolution, compared with the Lai product, the product has a good correlation between the farmland and the forest area and the reference value, and the overall accuracy basically meets the accuracy threshold of 0.5%, 20% specified by GCOS. By cross comparing this product with Lais products such as MODIS, geov1 and glass, the accuracy of this Lai product is better than that of similar products compared with reference value. In a word, the synthetic Lai data set of 1km / 5 days in Heihe River Basin comprehensively uses multi-source remote sensing data to improve the estimation accuracy and time resolution of Lai parameter products, so as to better serve the application of remote sensing data products.
metadata.descriptionCn: 黑河流域2015年1km/5天合成叶面积指数（LAI）数据集提供了2015年的5天LAI合成结果，该数据利用Terra/MODIS、Aqua/MODIS、以及国产卫星FY3A/MERSI和FY3B/MERSI传感器数据构建空间分辨率1km、时间分辨率5天的多源遥感数据集。多源遥感数据集可在有限时间内提供比单一传感器更多的角度和更多次的观测，但是，由于传感器的在轨运行时间及性能差异，多源数据集的观测质量参差不齐。因此，为更有效的利用多源数据集，算法首先对多源数据集进行了质量分级，根据观测合理性分为一级数据、二级数据、三级数据。三级数据为受薄云污染的观测，不用于计算。质量评估及分级的目的是为LAI反演时最优数据集的选择及反演算法流程设计提供依据。叶面积指数产品反演算法设计为区分山地平地、区分植被类型使用不同模型的神经网络法反演。基于全球DEM图和地表分类图，针对草地和农作物等连续植被采用PROSAIL模型，针对森林和山地植被采用坡面GOST模型。利用黑河上游森林和中游绿洲的地面实测数据生成的参考图，并将对应的高分辨率参考图升尺度到1km分辨率，与LAI产品进行比较，产品在农田和森林区域与参考值间均具有良好的相关性，总体精度基本满足GCOS规定的误差不超过 (0.5, 20%)的精度阈值。将本产品与MODIS、GEOV1和GLASS等LAI产品进行交叉对比，相比较参考值而言，本LAI产品精度优于同类产品。总之，黑河流域1km/5天合成LAI数据集综合利用多源遥感数据以提高LAI参数产品的估算精度、时间分辨率等，更好的服务于遥感数据产品的应用。

background: Upscaling of eco-hydrological processes on a heterogeneous surface is a grand challenge. Progress in this field is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations. HiWATER is an experiment designed to address this challenge through instrumentation on hierarchically nested scales to obtain multiscale and multidisciplinary data.
challenges: Progress in this field is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations.
methods: Several intensive observation periods (IOPs) and continuous hydrometeorological observations were carried out during HiWATER. Only data collected during the IOP in 2012 are presented in this paper. Instruments for the oasis-desert system were arranged in hierarchically nested scales to capture multi-scale eco-hydrological processes. We established a sparse network to investigate the oasis-desert interaction. One superstation was constructed within the oasis, and four EC towers and four two-layer automatic meteorological stations (AMSs) were installed in different landscapes surrounding the oasis, including sandy desert, desert pavement, desert steppe, and wetland. Intensive observations were implemented at the irrigation district scale. A total of 12 airborne remote sensing missions were conducted to cover the FEA using LiDAR, an imaging spectrometer, a multi-angle thermal imager, and an L-band microwave radiometer.
dataset: We introduce a multiscale dataset obtained from Heihe Watershed Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER) in an oasis-desert area in 2012. The HiWATER observation system consists of a flux observation matrix of eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, and automatic meteorological stations; an eco-hydrological sensor network of soil moisture and leaf area index; hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing using LiDAR, imaging spectrometer, multi-angle thermal imager, and L-band microwave radiometer; and synchronical ground measurements of vegetation dynamics and photosynthesis processes. All observational data were carefully quality controlled throughout sensor calibration, data collection, data processing, and datasets generation. The data are freely available at figshare and the Cold and Arid Regions Science Data Centre.
backgroundCn: 生态水文过程在异质表面上的上升尺度是一个重大挑战。该领域的进展受到多尺度观测数据稀缺的制约。HiWATER实验旨在通过在层次嵌套的尺度上进行仪器布置，以获取多尺度和多学科的数据，从而应对这一挑战。
challengesCn: 该领域的进展受到多尺度观测稀缺的阻碍。
methodsCn: 在HiWATER期间进行了几次强烈观测期（IOPs）和连续的水文气象观测。本文仅展示了2012年IOP期间收集的数据。为了捕捉多尺度生态水文过程，绿洲-沙漠系统的仪器按照层次嵌套的尺度进行布置。我们建立了一个稀疏网络，以研究绿洲-沙漠的相互作用。在绿洲内建造了一个超级站，并在绿洲周围不同的景观中安装了四个EC塔和四个两层自动气象站（AMS），这些景观包括沙质沙漠、沙漠铺装、沙漠草原和湿地。在灌溉区尺度上实施了强烈观测。共进行了12次空中遥感任务，使用了LiDAR、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计覆盖FEA。
datasetCn: 我们介绍了一个多尺度数据集，该数据集来自2012年在绿洲-沙漠地区进行的黑河流域联合遥测实验研究（HiWATER）。HiWATER观测系统由涡度协方差塔、大孔径闪烁仪和自动气象站组成的通量观测矩阵；土壤湿度和叶面积指数的生态水文传感器网络；使用激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计的超高分辨率航空遥感；以及同步的植被动态和光合作用过程的地面测量。所有观测数据在传感器校准、数据收集、数据处理和数据集生成过程中都经过了严格的质量控制。这些数据可在figshare和寒区与干旱区科学数据中心免费获取。

background: The Earth’s surface radiation budget is an essential parameter for estimation of the surface energy budget and is used for various applications, including weather prediction, monitoring and analysis of climate, and terrestrial ecological and hydrological systems. As a particularly important component of the surface radiation budget, surface solar irradiance (SSI) is the primary source of energy for the Earth’s surface; it controls the total energy exchange between the atmosphere and the land‐ocean surface and also serves as a key driving force for evapotranspiration, plant growth, and related processes. SSI data with large geographical coverage (up to global) and high spatiotemporal resolution can be obtained from satellite data. Estimating the surface solar radiation using satellite remote sensing techniques is essential not only for complementing the sparse network of surface station measurements, but also for verifying climate model output and reanalysis data.
research objective: In this paper, a new satellite‐derived approach for obtaining instantaneous surface solar irradiance (SSI) by combining Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS) and Multifunctional Transport Satellite (MTSAT) data is presented and validated using one year pyranometer measurements from five stations in northern China.
challenges: However, in mountainous areas the results need further refinement.
methods: Here we use MTSAT data to capture the changes of cloud fields in the atmosphere and use MODIS products to obtain the dynamic aerosol loading, water vapor content, surface reflectance, and other information. Meanwhile, on the basis of instantaneous retrieval results, the calculation of hourly average SSI is also explored.
dataset: Two types of satellite data were used in this study: polar‐orbiting satellite products from multispectral MODIS, and geostationary meteorological satellite data from the Multifunctional Transport Satellite MTSAT1R. The pyranometer data for validation come from five meteorological stations where the SSI is measured alongside other meteorological parameters. These stations are the Guantao and Daxing experimental stations in north China and the Yingke oasis station, Huazhaizi desert station, and A’rou freeze‐thaw observation station in northwest China.
findings: The preliminary validation demonstrates that both instantaneous and hourly SSIs can be produced accurately over northern China using this approach, and the retrieval quality of hourly SSI data is slightly better than that of instantaneous SSI data.
backgroundCn: 地球表面的辐射预算是估算表面能量预算的重要参数，广泛应用于天气预测、气候监测与分析以及陆地生态和水文系统。作为表面辐射预算中一个特别重要的组成部分，表面太阳辐射（SSI）是地球表面的主要能量来源；它控制着大气与陆地-海洋表面之间的总能量交换，并且也是蒸散、植物生长及相关过程的关键驱动力。可以通过卫星数据获取具有大范围（可达全球）和高时空分辨率的SSI数据。利用卫星遥感技术估算表面太阳辐射不仅对补充稀疏的地面站测量网络至关重要，还对验证气候模型输出和再分析数据具有重要意义。
research objectiveCn: 在本文中，提出了一种新的卫星衍生方法，通过结合中分辨率成像光谱仪（MODIS）和多功能运输卫星（MTSAT）数据来获取瞬时地表太阳辐照度（SSI），并使用来自中国北方五个站点的一年光伏计测量数据进行了验证。
challengesCn: 然而，在山区，结果需要进一步的细化。
methodsCn: 在这里，我们使用MTSAT数据捕捉大气中云场的变化，并利用MODIS产品获取动态气溶胶负荷、水汽含量、地表反射率等信息。同时，在瞬时反演结果的基础上，还探讨了小时平均SSI的计算。
datasetCn: 本研究使用了两种类型的卫星数据：来自多光谱MODIS的极轨卫星产品和来自多功能运输卫星MTSAT1R的地球静止气象卫星数据。用于验证的辐射计数据来自五个气象站，这些气象站测量太阳辐射强度（SSI）以及其他气象参数。这些气象站包括中国北方的观涛和大兴实验站，以及中国西北的英克绿洲站、华寨子沙漠站和阿柔冻融观测站。
findingsCn: 初步验证表明，使用这种方法可以准确地生成北中国的瞬时和小时太阳辐射强度（SSI），而小时SSI数据的检索质量略优于瞬时SSI数据。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method that utilizes multiple satellite sensors to improve observation quality in eco-hydrological studies?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个利用多个卫星传感器来提高生态水文研究观测质量的数据收集方法的例子？
Example.AnswerEn: A data collection method utilizes multiple satellite sensors such as Terra/MODIS, Aqua/MODIS, and FY3A/MERSI to create a composite dataset with a spatial resolution of 1km and temporal resolution of 5 days. This approach helps in obtaining more angles and observations than a single sensor could provide, allowing for improved observation quality in eco-hydrological studies.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种数据收集方法利用多个卫星传感器，如Terra/MODIS、Aqua/MODIS和FY3A/MERSI，创建一个空间分辨率为1公里、时间分辨率为5天的综合数据集。这种方法有助于获得比单一传感器更多的角度和观测，从而提高生态水文研究中的观测质量。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced when using multiscale observations in eco-hydrological research?
Example.QuestionCn: 在生态水文学研究中使用多尺度观测时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A significant challenge in using multiscale observations in eco-hydrological research is the poor availability of such observations, which hinders progress in understanding and modeling eco-hydrological processes across heterogeneous surfaces.
Example.AnswerCn: 在生态水文研究中，使用多尺度观测的一个重大挑战是观测数据的稀缺，这阻碍了对异质表面上生态水文过程的理解和建模的进展。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of a multiscale dataset obtained from eco-hydrological research in an oasis-desert area?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个来自绿洲-沙漠地区生态水文研究的多尺度数据集的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a multiscale dataset obtained from eco-hydrological research is the dataset from the Heihe Watershed Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER) project, which includes a flux observation matrix, an eco-hydrological sensor network, hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing data, and ground measurements of vegetation dynamics and photosynthesis processes.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个来自生态水文研究的多尺度数据集的例子是来自黑河流域联合遥测实验研究（HiWATER）项目的数据集，其中包括通量观测矩阵、生态水文传感器网络、高分辨率航空遥感数据以及植被动态和光合作用过程的地面测量。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the significance of multiscale observations in eco-hydrological research?
Definition.QuestionCn: 多尺度观测在生态水文研究中的重要性是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Multiscale observations are crucial in eco-hydrological research as they allow for the capturing of processes at different scales, which is important for understanding the complex interactions and dynamics within heterogeneous surfaces. The HiWATER experiment uses a multiscale observation system including eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, and automatic meteorological stations to address the challenge of limited multiscale data availability.
Definition.AnswerCn: 多尺度观测在生态水文研究中至关重要，因为它们能够捕捉不同尺度上的过程，这对于理解异质表面内复杂的相互作用和动态非常重要。HiWATER实验使用多尺度观测系统，包括涡度协方差塔、大孔径闪烁仪和自动气象站，以应对多尺度数据可用性有限的挑战。

Definition.QuestionEn: How does the neural network method contribute to the inversion of Leaf Area Index (LAI) products in different terrains?
Definition.QuestionCn: 神经网络方法如何在不同地形中对叶面积指数（LAI）产品的反演做出贡献？
Definition.AnswerEn: The neural network method aids in the inversion of LAI products by utilizing different models for various terrains. For instance, the PROSAIL model is used for continuous vegetation like grasslands and crops, while the GOST model is applied to forest and mountain vegetation. This distinction allows for more accurate representation and processing of LAI data in diverse environmental conditions.
Definition.AnswerCn: 神经网络方法通过对不同地形使用不同模型来帮助反演LAI产品。例如，PROSAIL模型用于连续植被，如草地和农作物，而GOST模型则应用于森林和山区植被。这种区分使得在不同环境条件下对LAI数据的表示和处理更加准确。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in data collection methods between the HiWATER experiment and the approach for estimating surface solar irradiance (SSI) using satellite data?
Comparison.QuestionCn: HiWATER实验的数据收集方法与使用卫星数据估算表面太阳辐射（SSI）的方法之间的区别是什么？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The HiWATER experiment employs a hierarchical instrumentation approach with flux observation matrices, eco-hydrological sensor networks, and hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing to capture multiscale eco-hydrological processes. In contrast, the SSI estimation method combines MODIS and MTSAT satellite data to derive surface irradiance, focusing on capturing atmospheric changes and dynamic aerosol loading for broader geographical coverage. While HiWATER focuses on a nested scale for detailed local observations, the SSI method emphasizes satellite-derived atmospheric and surface reflectance data for larger areas.
Comparison.AnswerCn: HiWATER实验采用分层仪器方法，通过通量观测矩阵、生态水文传感器网络和超高分辨率航空遥感来捕捉多尺度生态水文过程。相比之下，SSI估计方法结合MODIS和MTSAT卫星数据来推导表面辐照度，重点捕捉大气变化和动态气溶胶负荷，以实现更广泛的地理覆盖。HiWATER侧重于嵌套尺度以进行详细的地方观察，而SSI方法则强调基于卫星的气象和表面反射率数据，以覆盖更大区域。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What insights can be drawn from the use of satellite-derived surface solar irradiance (SSI) data for advancing the understanding of surface energy budgets in different geographical regions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 从卫星获取的地表太阳辐射（SSI）数据的使用中，可以得出哪些见解，以促进对不同地理区域表面能量预算的理解？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Satellite-derived SSI data, integrated from sources like MODIS and MTSAT, provide crucial insights into surface energy budgets by offering extensive geographical coverage and high spatiotemporal resolution. This data is vital for applications in weather prediction and climate monitoring. In particular, it helps validate and enhance the accuracy of climate models and reanalysis data. However, the approach requires refinement in mountainous areas to improve retrieval accuracy.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 卫星衍生的SSI数据，整合了MODIS和MTSAT等来源，提供了关于地表能量预算的重要见解，具有广泛的地理覆盖和高时空分辨率。这些数据对于天气预测和气候监测的应用至关重要。特别是，它有助于验证和提高气候模型和再分析数据的准确性。然而，在山区，该方法需要改进以提高检索准确性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges in obtaining multiscale observations for eco-hydrological processes on heterogeneous surfaces?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 获取异质表面生态水文过程的多尺度观测所面临的挑战的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Progress in the field is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations, which is a grand challenge due to the complexity of capturing eco-hydrological processes across diverse landscapes and scales.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 该领域的进展受到多尺度观测稀缺的阻碍，这是一个重大挑战，因为在不同的景观和尺度上捕捉生态水文过程的复杂性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is the quality assessment and grading of multi-source remote sensing data necessary for effective utilization in leaf area index (LAI) estimation?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 多源遥感数据的质量评估和分级对于有效利用叶面积指数（LAI）估计是必要的，原因如下：
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The quality assessment and grading of multi-source remote sensing data are necessary to address the varying observational quality due to differences in sensor performance and operational times, ensuring the selection of optimal datasets for LAI estimation.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 多源遥感数据的质量评估和分级是必要的，以应对由于传感器性能和操作时间差异导致的观测质量变化，确保为叶面积指数（LAI）估计选择最佳数据集。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What is the impact on data quality and accuracy when using multi-source remote sensing data instead of relying on a single sensor for leaf area index (LAI) estimation?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用多源遥感数据而不是依赖单一传感器进行叶面积指数（LAI）估计时，对数据质量和准确性的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using multi-source remote sensing data, such as combining Terra/MODIS, Aqua/MODIS, and FY3A/MERSI, improves the estimation accuracy and time resolution of LAI parameters by providing more angles and observations. However, due to differences in sensor performance and operation times, the quality of multi-source data can be inconsistent. Quality grading is necessary to ensure optimal dataset selection for LAI inversion, enhancing the overall accuracy compared to single-source data.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用多源遥感数据，如结合Terra/MODIS、Aqua/MODIS和FY3A/MERSI，可以通过提供更多的观测角度和观测次数，提高LAI参数的估计精度和时间分辨率。然而，由于传感器性能和操作时间的差异，多源数据的质量可能不一致。因此，进行质量分级是必要的，以确保为LAI反演选择最佳数据集，从而提高整体精度，相较于单源数据更为准确。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the consequences of using satellite-derived surface solar irradiance (SSI) data in comparison to ground-based pyranometer measurements for monitoring climate and ecological systems?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用卫星获取的地表太阳辐射（SSI）数据与基于地面的辐射计测量相比，在监测气候和生态系统方面会产生哪些后果？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using satellite-derived SSI data, such as from MODIS and MTSAT, provides extensive geographical coverage and high spatiotemporal resolution, complementing the sparse network of ground-based pyranometer measurements. This approach enhances the ability to verify climate models and reanalysis data, though results in mountainous areas may require further refinement. The combination of satellite data enables accurate estimation of SSI, which is crucial for understanding surface energy exchanges and driving ecological processes.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用卫星获取的太阳辐射强度（SSI）数据，如MODIS和MTSAT，提供了广泛的地理覆盖和高时空分辨率，补充了稀疏的地面辐射计测量网络。这种方法增强了验证气候模型和再分析数据的能力，尽管在山区的结果可能需要进一步的修正。卫星数据的结合使得对SSI的准确估计成为可能，这对于理解表面能量交换和驱动生态过程至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the objectives behind creating a multiscale dataset for eco-hydrological processes in the Heihe Watershed?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 创建多尺度生态水文过程数据集的目标是什么？在黑河流域中。
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective is to address the challenge of upscaling eco-hydrological processes on a heterogeneous surface, which is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations. The HiWATER experiment facilitates this by using instrumentation on hierarchically nested scales to obtain multiscale and multidisciplinary data.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是解决在异质表面上提升生态水文过程的挑战，这一挑战受到多尺度观测稀缺的制约。HiWATER实验通过在层次嵌套的尺度上使用仪器，获取多尺度和多学科的数据，从而促进这一目标的实现。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to utilize multi-source remote sensing data for estimating leaf area index (LAI) in the Heihe River Basin?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在黑河流域，利用多源遥感数据估算叶面积指数（LAI）的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Using multi-source remote sensing data allows for improved estimation accuracy of LAI parameters by providing more observation angles and increased frequency of observations within a limited timeframe. This approach also helps in selecting optimal datasets and designing retrieval algorithm processes tailored for different vegetation types and terrains.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 使用多源遥感数据可以通过提供更多的观测角度和在有限时间内增加观测频率，从而提高LAI参数的估计精度。这种方法还有助于选择最佳数据集，并为不同的植被类型和地形设计量测算法过程。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are involved in calibrating sensors and controlling the quality of multiscale datasets used in eco-hydrological research?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在生态水文研究中，校准传感器和控制多尺度数据集质量涉及哪些程序？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: In the field, all observational data are carefully quality controlled throughout the sensor calibration, data collection, data processing, and dataset generation stages. This involves ensuring the reliability of instruments like eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, and automatic meteorological stations, as well as synchronical ground measurements of vegetation dynamics and photosynthesis processes.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 在现场，所有观测数据在传感器校准、数据收集、数据处理和数据集生成阶段都经过严格的质量控制。这涉及确保仪器的可靠性，如涡度协方差塔、大孔径闪烁仪和自动气象站，以及同步的植被动态和光合作用过程的地面测量。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can different models be applied to retrieve leaf area index (LAI) in varied landscapes such as grassland, cropland, and forest areas?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 不同模型如何应用于在草地、农田和森林等不同景观中获取叶面积指数（LAI）？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To retrieve LAI in varied landscapes, different models are used such as the PROSAIL model for continuous vegetation like grassland and cropland, and the slope GOST model for forest and mountain areas. This approach allows for the distinction between plains and mountains and the use of appropriate models for different vegetation types.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了在不同的景观中获取叶面积指数（LAI），使用了不同的模型，例如用于连续植被如草地和农田的PROSAIL模型，以及用于森林和山区的斜坡GOST模型。这种方法允许区分平原和山区，并为不同的植被类型使用适当的模型。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodologies are employed to ensure the accuracy and validation of surface solar irradiance (SSI) data obtained from satellite remote sensing?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为了确保从卫星遥感获取的表面太阳辐射（SSI）数据的准确性和验证，采用了哪些方法论？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The methodologies involve using MTSAT data to capture changes in cloud fields and MODIS products to obtain dynamic aerosol loading, water vapor content, and surface reflectance. The instantaneous retrieval results are further refined to calculate hourly average SSI, and the data is validated using pyranometer measurements from various meteorological stations.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 这些方法涉及使用MTSAT数据捕捉云场变化，并利用MODIS产品获取动态气溶胶负荷、水汽含量和表面反射率。瞬时检索结果进一步精炼，以计算每小时平均的太阳辐射强度（SSI），并通过来自各个气象站的辐射计测量数据进行验证。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methods enable the collection of multiscale eco-hydrological data in heterogeneous environments?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法能够在异质环境中收集多尺度生态水文数据？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The collection of multiscale eco-hydrological data is enabled by the use of instrumentation on hierarchically nested scales, including a flux observation matrix of eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, automatic meteorological stations, and a sensor network for soil moisture and leaf area index. Additionally, hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing using LiDAR, imaging spectrometers, multi-angle thermal imagers, and L-band microwave radiometers are employed.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 多尺度生态水文数据的收集得益于在层次嵌套尺度上使用仪器，包括涡度协方差塔的大气通量观测矩阵、大孔径闪烁仪、自动气象站，以及用于土壤湿度和叶面积指数的传感器网络。此外，还采用超高分辨率的航空遥感技术，包括激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do quality control processes enhance the reliability of datasets in eco-hydrological research?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 质量控制过程如何增强生态水文学研究中数据集的可靠性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Quality control processes enhance the reliability of datasets by ensuring careful calibration of sensors, meticulous data collection, thorough data processing, and careful generation of datasets. These processes are crucial to maintaining the integrity and accuracy of the data collected during eco-hydrological research.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 质量控制过程通过确保传感器的精确校准、细致的数据收集、全面的数据处理和谨慎的数据集生成，增强了数据集的可靠性。这些过程对于维护生态水文研究中收集数据的完整性和准确性至关重要。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological solutions enable the accurate retrieval of surface solar irradiance data from satellite observations?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术解决方案能够从卫星观测中准确获取地表太阳辐射数据？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The accurate retrieval of surface solar irradiance data is enabled by combining data from the Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS) and the Multifunctional Transport Satellite (MTSAT). This approach allows for capturing changes in cloud fields, dynamic aerosol loading, water vapor content, and surface reflectance, which are essential for calculating instantaneous and hourly average surface solar irradiance.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 通过结合中分辨率成像光谱仪（MODIS）和多功能运输卫星（MTSAT）的数据，可以准确获取地表太阳辐照度数据。这种方法能够捕捉云场变化、动态气溶胶负荷、水汽含量和地表反射率，这些都是计算瞬时和小时平均地表太阳辐照度所必需的。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be challenges in achieving high-quality multiscale observations for eco-hydrological processes on heterogeneous surfaces?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在异质表面上实现高质量的多尺度生态水文过程观测可能面临哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Challenges in achieving high-quality multiscale observations arise due to the poor availability of multiscale observations, which is a significant hindrance in the field. The complexity of capturing eco-hydrological processes on heterogeneous surfaces requires a comprehensive instrumentation strategy, such as the hierarchically nested scales used in HiWATER, to obtain multi-scale and multidisciplinary data.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在实现高质量多尺度观测方面，面临的挑战主要是多尺度观测的可用性较差，这在该领域中是一个显著的障碍。捕捉异质表面上的生态水文过程的复杂性需要一个全面的仪器策略，例如在HiWATER中使用的分层嵌套尺度，以获取多尺度和多学科的数据。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to use different models for different vegetation types in the design of LAI inversion algorithms?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在LAI反演算法的设计中，为不同植被类型使用不同模型的重要性是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: It is important to use different models for different vegetation types because the structural and ecological characteristics of vegetation, such as those found in grasslands, crops, forests, and mountainous regions, vary significantly. By distinguishing between mountain and plain areas and using tailored models like the PROSAIL for continuous vegetation and the slope GOST model for forest and mountain vegetation, the LAI inversion algorithm can more accurately estimate the leaf area index, thus improving the product's precision and applicability.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 使用不同的模型来处理不同的植被类型是很重要的，因为植被的结构和生态特征，如草原、农作物、森林和山区，存在显著差异。通过区分山区和平原地区，并使用针对连续植被的PROSAIL模型和针对森林及山区植被的坡度GOST模型，LAI反演算法可以更准确地估计叶面积指数，从而提高产品的精度和适用性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How do hierarchical nested scales in the HiWATER experiment contribute to the understanding of eco-hydrological processes in oasis-desert systems?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: HiWATER实验中的层次嵌套尺度如何有助于理解绿洲-沙漠系统中的生态水文过程？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Hierarchical nested scales in the HiWATER experiment allow for capturing multi-scale eco-hydrological processes by using a diverse array of instruments, such as eddy covariance towers and automatic meteorological stations, in various landscapes. This approach provides detailed and multiscale data that are essential for understanding interactions in the oasis-desert system, thereby addressing the challenge of limited multiscale observations and improving the overall data quality and availability.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: HiWATER实验中的分层嵌套尺度允许通过在不同景观中使用多种仪器，如涡度协方差塔和自动气象站，捕捉多尺度生态水文过程。这种方法提供了详细的多尺度数据，对于理解绿洲-沙漠系统中的相互作用至关重要，从而解决了多尺度观测有限的问题，提高了整体数据质量和可用性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with using satellite data to estimate surface solar irradiance (SSI) in mountainous areas, and how might these be addressed?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 使用卫星数据估算山区表面太阳辐射（SSI）面临哪些挑战，以及如何应对这些挑战？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Estimating SSI in mountainous areas poses challenges due to terrain variability, which affects the accuracy of satellite-derived data. The results in such areas require further refinement to address these challenges. Combining multiple data sources, such as MODIS and MTSAT, and incorporating ground-based validation using pyranometer measurements can help improve the accuracy and address the complexities introduced by mountainous terrain.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在山区估算太阳辐射指数（SSI）面临挑战，因为地形的变化影响了卫星衍生数据的准确性。这些地区的结果需要进一步的修正以应对这些挑战。结合多种数据源，如MODIS和MTSAT，并利用辐射计测量进行地面验证，可以帮助提高准确性，并解决山区地形带来的复杂性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how multiscale observations can be effectively managed when dealing with heterogeneous surfaces in eco-hydrological research.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白在生态水文研究中，如何有效管理在处理异质表面时的多尺度观测。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Multiscale observations in eco-hydrological research can be effectively managed through the use of experiments like HiWATER, which addresses this challenge by utilizing instrumentation on hierarchically nested scales. This approach involves capturing multiscale eco-hydrological processes with a sparse network, including the use of eddy covariance towers, meteorological stations, and various remote sensing missions.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 在生态水文研究中，多尺度观测可以通过像HiWATER这样的实验有效管理，该实验通过利用分层嵌套尺度的仪器来应对这一挑战。这种方法涉及通过稀疏网络捕捉多尺度生态水文过程，包括使用涡度协方差塔、气象站和各种遥感任务。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the best way to ensure the quality of data collected from multiple satellite sensors with varying performance characteristics.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定确保来自多个卫星传感器的数据质量的最佳方法，这些传感器具有不同的性能特征。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Ensuring the quality of data collected from multiple satellite sensors can involve a quality grading system for multisource datasets, as demonstrated in the LAI data collection. This system classifies data based on observational rationality and excludes data affected by thin cloud contamination from calculations. This method helps in selecting the optimal dataset for retrieval algorithm design.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 确保从多个卫星传感器收集的数据质量可以涉及多源数据集的质量评分系统，正如在LAI数据收集中所示。该系统根据观测合理性对数据进行分类，并排除受薄云污染影响的数据。这种方法有助于选择最佳数据集以进行反演算法设计。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore the data quality control measures applied in eco-hydrological datasets and evaluate their effectiveness in ensuring reliable data collection.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨在生态水文数据集中应用的数据质量控制措施，并评估它们在确保可靠数据收集方面的有效性。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The data quality control measures include sensor calibration, data collection processes, data processing, and dataset generation. These measures are applied to ensure the reliability and accuracy of the collected data. By using such rigorous quality control protocols, the datasets are maintained at high standards, which are crucial for accurate eco-hydrological analysis and modeling.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 数据质量控制措施包括传感器校准、数据收集过程、数据处理和数据集生成。这些措施的实施旨在确保所收集数据的可靠性和准确性。通过采用如此严格的质量控制协议，数据集得以保持在高标准，这对于准确的生态水文分析和建模至关重要。
